member.name: STORAGE_HOTPLUG_INFO
member.summary: Provides information about the hotplug information of a device.

member.name: STORAGE_HOTPLUG_INFO.Size
member.summary: The size of this structure, in bytes. The caller must set this member tosizeof(STORAGE_HOTPLUG_INFO).

member.name: STORAGE_HOTPLUG_INFO.MediaRemovable
member.summary: If this member is set to a nonzero value, the device media is removable. Otherwise, the device media is not removable.

member.name: STORAGE_HOTPLUG_INFO.MediaHotplug
member.summary: If this member is set to a nonzero value, the media is not lockable. Otherwise, the device media is lockable.

member.name: STORAGE_HOTPLUG_INFO.DeviceHotplug
member.summary: If this member is set to a nonzero value, the device is a hotplug device. Otherwise, the device is not a hotplug device.

member.name: STORAGE_HOTPLUG_INFO.WriteCacheEnableOverride
member.summary: Reserved; set the value to NULL.
